author: modena
title: Great Bricks!
review:
This was a nice set, but I never built it like on the picture. 

Pros:

  • Great parts!
  • Nice detail!
  • Superb colours!
  • Big wheels!
  • Fantastic, big, green plate!

Cons:

  • (This set might have some, but I never played with this set to find some.)

Overall:

This was a nice set, but I mostly had use of the pieces. They really worked well with two 628s and a 4423.
Overall, if you find it, you might have fun with it, but it has good parts for a house!
